Content:: The first Sirisena cabinet was a central government of Sri Lanka led by President Maithripala Sirisena. It was formed in January 2015 after the presidential election and ended in August 2015 following the parliamentary election. Ministers appointed under article 43(1) of the constitution. Ministers appointed under article 44(1) of the constitution. Ministers appointed under article 45(1) of the constitution. ‚úù Died while in office.
